ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] help with mage
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a lvl 53 war. I cant kill some animals. Is their a way 2 lvl up that hi? ... about to lv 50 then  go in kc till lv 55 i hope this help i have a lv 54
ygData.messageBody:
I have a lvl 53 war. I cant kill some animals. Is their a way 2 lvl up that hi?

JASON GALLOWAY <snake2001_44112@...> wrote:

--- Kittin LovesYou <KittinLovesYou@...>
wrote:
> Hi.  I have a lvl 26 mage on Rallos, and no matter
> how hard i try, I cant seem to get past this lvl.  I
> have been in full groups killing reds in FV for
> hours and still only gotten like half a bub of xp,
> and all the others in my group were around teh same
> lvl.  I have tried soloing and still nothing.  I am
> curious waht I should do, because I lvled really
> quick until 24 and it took me about teh same amount
> of time to get to 24 as it did to get from 24 to 26.
>  I am about done with it because I cant seem to go
> anywhere with her.  I started a druid on another
> server and have been playing that, but if i CAN find
> a way to lvl up my mage, Id liek to.  Thanks in
> advance for all your help.
> Kittin
>
> try hunting in hhk till 35 from go to deadlands to
about to lv 50 then  go in kc till lv 55 i hope this
help i have a lv 54 mag on brell sever if you need any
more help let me
know______________________________________________________
